message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this fantastic product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $20000. This is a significant discount from what it's truly worth to me, but I'm confident you'll see its potential. Let me know your thoughts.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not sure it's worth $20000 to me. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $15000. I'm willing to make a deal at this price, but I'm not willing to go any higher.
